name: debug
description: Extract likely related code and context from a log snippet.

outputSchema.command: string - always 'debug' in JSON envelope mode
outputSchema.exitCode: number - CLI exit code (0 on success)
outputSchema.errors: array - parsed error entries from log text
outputSchema.summary: object - counts, top matches, and suggestions

notes: Works with stack traces, error messages, or log snippets
Automatically extracts file paths and line numbers from logs
